list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor Step2Checks: remove file validation, enhance error UI, and add results tables
- Removed redundant file validation step to simplify checks. - Introduced detailed tables for displaying configuration statuses and errors in Config.ini, PlateConfig.ini, and ZymoCubeCtrl.ini sections. - Improved UI with dynamic parameter handling and extended progress detail visibility. - Modified PDF report generation to include uniform margins and updated section styles for better readability. - General cleanup for unused variables and redundant code.

component.name: FlaskConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

project.component: { "keyToString": { "ModuleVcsDetector.initialDetectionPerformed": "true", "Python tests.Python tests for test_processAcquisitionLog.TestFindLastAcquisition.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests for test_processAcquisitionLog.TestFindLastAcquisition.test_find_last_acquisition_no_matches.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in test_processAcquisitionLog.py.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in test_step2_checks.py.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests in tests.executor": "Run", "Python.Routine_VALIDATION_ZC_18022025.executor": "Run", "Python.cli.executor": "Run", "Python.getDatasFromWellResults.executor": "Run", "Python.main.executor": "Run", "Python.main_window.executor": "Run", "Python.processAcquisitionLog.executor": "Debug", "Python.report_generator.executor": "Run", "Python.step1_info.executor": "Run", "Python.step2_checks.executor": "Run", "Python.step3_acquisition.executor": "Run", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.TerminalTabsStorage.copyFrom.TerminalArrangementManager": "true", "RunOnceActivity.git.unshallow": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "test/custum-percentage-degradation", "ignore.virus.scanning.warn.message": "true", "junie.onboarding.icon.badge.shown": "true", "last_opened_file_path": "C:/Users/PCP-Zymoptiq/PycharmProjects/ZymDeploy/zymosoft_assistant/scripts", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "run.code.analysis.last.selected.profile": "aDefault", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "org.jetbrains.plugins.github.ui.GithubSettingsConfigurable", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true" } }

task.summary: Add GUI step modules for installation assistant: Step1Info and Step2Checks.

Add thread-safe communication and summary tab to Step2Checks
- Introduced `Step2Helper` class using `QObject` for thread-safe signals. - Integrated signals for progress updates, results display, and error handling. - Added a new "Summary" tab with a detailed verification results overview.

Refactor Step1Info and MainWindow UI for enhanced design consistency:
- Added structured sections and reusable components to Step1Info for streamlined widget creation. - Updated visual styles, specifically for error handling and form validation. - Reorganized MainWindow UI layout with a sidebar and improved navigation handling. - Enhanced progress indicator styling with support for multiple statuses.
Add comment in `Routine_VALIDATION_ZC_18022025.py` to clarify function purpose

Add validation criteria table in `report_generator` and configure application icon in `main`
- Implemented validation results section with a styled table, conditional formatting, and criteria checks. - Configured the application icon path for Qt GUI initialization in `main.py`. - Updates to UI image navigation in Step 3 with new navigation controls.

Add backup routine scripts for Zymosoft Assistant
- Added two functions (`repeta_sans_ref_v1` and `repeta_sans_ref_v1_nanofilm`) for data aggregation, analysis, and visualization of imaging data. - Includes CSV generation, colormap rendering, and CV threshold evaluation for plates.

Improve error label handling in `Step1Info` and update various styles
- Reserved space for error messages by setting a minimum height to prevent UI compaction. - Adjustments made to comment formatting for better readability across signal connections. - Improved progress styling logic in `MainWindow` for better user feedback. - Updated validation comparison thresholds in `Step3Acquisition` for enhanced accuracy.

Refactor Step2Checks: remove file validation, enhance error UI, and add results tables
- Removed redundant file validation step to simplify checks. - Introduced detailed tables for displaying configuration statuses and errors in Config.ini, PlateConfig.ini, and ZymoCubeCtrl.ini sections. - Improved UI with dynamic parameter handling and extended progress detail visibility. - Modified PDF report generation to include uniform margins and updated section styles for better readability. - General cleanup for unused variables and redundant code.

MESSAGE.value: Add GUI step modules for installation assistant: Step1Info and Step2Checks.

Add thread-safe communication and summary tab to Step2Checks
- Introduced `Step2Helper` class using `QObject` for thread-safe signals. - Integrated signals for progress updates, results display, and error handling. - Added a new "Summary" tab with a detailed verification results overview.

Refactor Step1Info and MainWindow UI for enhanced design consistency:
- Added structured sections and reusable components to Step1Info for streamlined widget creation. - Updated visual styles, specifically for error handling and form validation. - Reorganized MainWindow UI layout with a sidebar and improved navigation handling. - Enhanced progress indicator styling with support for multiple statuses.
Add comment in `Routine_VALIDATION_ZC_18022025.py` to clarify function purpose

Add validation criteria table in `report_generator` and configure application icon in `main`
- Implemented validation results section with a styled table, conditional formatting, and criteria checks. - Configured the application icon path for Qt GUI initialization in `main.py`. - Updates to UI image navigation in Step 3 with new navigation controls.

Add backup routine scripts for Zymosoft Assistant
- Added two functions (`repeta_sans_ref_v1` and `repeta_sans_ref_v1_nanofilm`) for data aggregation, analysis, and visualization of imaging data. - Includes CSV generation, colormap rendering, and CV threshold evaluation for plates.

Improve error label handling in `Step1Info` and update various styles
- Reserved space for error messages by setting a minimum height to prevent UI compaction. - Adjustments made to comment formatting for better readability across signal connections. - Improved progress styling logic in `MainWindow` for better user feedback. - Updated validation comparison thresholds in `Step3Acquisition` for enhanced accuracy.

Refactor Step2Checks: remove file validation, enhance error UI, and add results tables
- Removed redundant file validation step to simplify checks. - Introduced detailed tables for displaying configuration statuses and errors in Config.ini, PlateConfig.ini, and ZymoCubeCtrl.ini sections. - Improved UI with dynamic parameter handling and extended progress detail visibility. - Modified PDF report generation to include uniform margins and updated section styles for better readability. - General cleanup for unused variables and redundant code.
